name: Arcane Implement Generator for Blades in the Dark
name_original: Arcane Implement Generator for Blades in the Dark
description:
There's a lot of strange mysticism floating around in Blades in the Dark, renowned tabletop RPG by John Harper - but what is an arcane implement? What other mystic items might exist? This generator is an attempt to answer that question by creating strange, haunting items that surely have magical properties, by what they can be used for.

This generator released as PWYW, however, do please consider donating either here or on ko-fi if you enjoy it, or tell your friends about it. Also, follow me on twitter or tumblr for updates on this and other generators (I have big plans afoot), as well as art, art process/tutorial videos, RPG content, and much more.

Find out more about me and the generator in the about page within. I'd love to hear about what you create!

Art all based off items generated within.
